entry.title: Synchronous Goods Receipts in EWM decentralized warehouses with MIGO
entry.content:
Scenario: 2 EWM decentralized warehouses mapped under the same ERP plant.  Shipments between warehouses are done daily in both directions. No billing / invoicing involved. 
Request: Research possibility to trigger the movements directly from MIGO tx. (311 movement) in order to avoid the standard INTRACO STO.  Currently they managed both physical warehouses under the same roof at their current WMS. We want to find the easiest setup to avoid this configuration in the future
Comments: 

  • Could we use Synchronous goods receipt in this scenario? My understanding is that we cannot. 
  • Is there any way to trigger the deliveries from MIGO under this scenario?
  • Suggestions and /or experiences for this kind of situations are welcome. 

Thanks in advance

entry.title: How to get the content of a file selected via File Uploader?
entry.content:
Hi,
I am pretty new in SAPUI5 apps,
In my app i have a file uploader button.

What i need is very basic.
When user selects a file i need to get the content of this file (raw, binary...etc).

Then i can send this content to an odata service.

Here is my sample code: Please provide me a sample code or tell me where i can see the content.

Thanks.

Here is my: View1.view.xml

 <mvc:View controllerName="project2.controller.View1"
    xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
    xmlns="sap.m"
    xmlns:unified="sap.ui.unified">

    <Page id="page" title="{i18n>title}">
        <content> 

        <HBox id="buttonLine" width="100%" justifyContent="Center">
            <Button xmlns="sap.m" text="Download Template" id="button0" width="620px" press="onDownloadTemplateButtonPress" /> 

            <unified:FileUploader id="fileUploader" change="onFileChange" visible="true" buttonOnly="true" width="620px" buttonText="Upload Excel File"/>
            </HBox>
        
        </content> 
    </Page>
    
</mvc:View>

 

Here is my: View1.controller.js

----View1.controller.js----
onFileChange: function (oEvent) {
var oFile = oEvent.getParameter("files")[0];


if (oFile) {

this._oSelectedFile = oFile;

var oReader = new FileReader();

oReader.onload = function (oEvent) {

var sFileContent = oEvent.target.result;
var oPayload = {
FileName: this._oSelectedFile.name, // File name
MimeType: this._oSelectedFile.type, // File MIME type
FileContent: btoa(sFileContent) // Encode file content as Base64
};

var oTextArea = this.byId("fileContentArea");
oTextArea.setValue(sFileContent);
}.bind(this);

oReader.readAsText(oFile);
}
},

WHY IS MY QUESTION A SPAM?

WHICH PART?

AND WHY IS THE NUMBER WHICH INDICATES THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHO SAW THIS POST INCREASES WHENEVER I REFRESH THIS PAGE?

entry.title: Delay data loading of SAP Macros table until button click? - UI5
entry.content:
Hi all - Wanted to know if its possible to delay loading of data from a macros table within a XML fragment? Currently, when you click on a list page record -> open object page -> my macros table in a custom section renders, and loads all table data correctly. All of this data is via CDS entity where I define the metaPath in my XML fragment. Table renders, and data loads in just fine. 

Now, I would like to extend the functionality by adding a button ("Get Data") in the object page custom section, that when clicked, will load the data, and not when user opens the object page. Anybody have any examples of this I can potentially reference? 

Right now, my initial thoughts were using the pre-made controller JS extension file for my object page to try to not bind the data in the onInit() function? Then in my controller file for the XML fragment load the frag, and bind the data upon button click?

 
sap.ui.define(
[
    "sap/m/MessageToast",
    'sap/ui/model/Filter',
    'sap/ui/model/FilterOperator',
    'sap/ui/core/Fragment'

], function(MessageToast, Filter, FilterOperator, Fragment) {
    'use strict';
    return {
        onLoadData: async function (oEvent) {
                  ***load fragment -> find macros table ID -> bind elements via metapath to entity?***
        }
    };
});

__PRESENT

__PRESENT__PRESENT

entry.title: how to use forceGlobalRefresh for adaptation project in Manifest_appdescr file
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I'm working on an adaptation project which was previously using SAPUI5 version 1.96. Following an upgrade the SAPUI5 version changed to 1.130, after the upgrade forceGlobalRefresh is set defaults to false (as per the behavior introduced in version 1.106).

I need to explicitly enable forceGlobalRefresh for the application, but adding the property directly to the manifest_appdescr.json file using the following configuration does not appear to have any effect:

{
     "changeType": "appdescr_ui_generic_app_setSettings",
     "content": {
                              "settings": {
                              "draftEnabled": true,
                              "forceGlobalRefresh": true
                          }
     }
}

 

Any suggestion or solution to fix this will be greatly appreciated.

 

 

SAPUI5

entry.title: My SAP BTP Trial account is active but not able to login via Eclipse
entry.content:
My SAP BTP Trial account is active but not able to login via Eclipse, here is the validity days and error message via Eclipse login. How to solve it?

Though I have given right logins, keep getting this login page.

Thanks.

entry.title: I want to convert text to YAML in a SAPUI5 application using TypeScript.
entry.content:
We are currently developing a SAPUI5 application in TypeScript.
We would like to use the following CDN to convert a YAML file loaded as text to YAML, but the application deployed on SAP BTP is unable to load the CDN and perform the conversion. (It can be read in the local environment.)

"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/yamljs@0.3.0/dist/yaml.min.js"

Is there any way to use a CDN with TypeScript?
Also, is there any other way to convert from text to YAML other than CDN?

 

Currently, it is set up as follows, as it was when it worked with Javascript.

index.html

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/yamljs@0.3.0/dist/yaml.min.js"></script>

Component.ts

sap.ui.loader.config({
	paths: {
	  "yamljs": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/yamljs@0.3.0/dist/yaml.min"
	}
});

Master.controller.ts

import * as YAML from "yamljs";

const YAML = (window as any).YAML;
var nativeObject = YAML.parse(strDataReplace);

The errors displayed are as follows

TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'parse')

entry.title: Request for Official SAP Documentation for GST India ‚Äì End-to-End Process and Configuration
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support Team,

I am currently working on an SAP S/4HANA implementation project with a focus on Indian GST compliance. However, I am unable to locate any official and comprehensive SAP documentation that covers the end-to-end GST India configuration, including Condition based GST approach .

Could you please assist by providing the links or references to the latest official SAP documentation or configuration guides on the following:

  1. GST India Implementation (end-to-end including tax code setup, reporting, and compliance)

  2. Standard SAP Processes for Accounts Payable under GST

  3. Standard SAP Processes for Accounts Receivable under GST

  4. Any SAP Notes, SAP Help Portal links, or Best Practice Explorer content relevant to Indian GST

My objective is to ensure our implementation aligns with SAP's best practices and complies with Indian statutory reporting formats such as GSTR-1, GSTR-2A/2B, GSTR-3B, and E-invoicing.

Looking forward to your kind support.

Best regards,
Amrit Ravindra 

üîç

entry.title: SAP SD Certification code
entry.content:
Dear Community,
I would like to schedule an exam for SAP SD, 
Could you please let me know the latest SAP SD global certification code for exam.

Thanks!!

entry.title: Query on Multilevel and Period Control Methods in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi, can anyone clarify where I can find the list of standard multilevel methods and period control methods available in SAP Public Cloud, apart from what's shown in the depreciation key details? Also, is it possible to change the percentage rates in a multilevel method in the Public Cloud?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: SAP JVA Partner billing issue
entry.content:
Hello Team,

This issue is related to SAP Joint venture accounting module partner billing issue.

When the business is running the GJ14 transaction for hardcopy billing, the amounts in partner billing is not adding up correctly and we could see difference between expenditure, working capitals and total payments total amounts.

I have seen the business has not maintained the JIB/ JIBE mapping configuration and we get warning messages of JIB/JIBE mapping failure message no GJ837 during execution of expenditure details before billing. So can this be the reason for the difference between the total amounts and expenditure/ working capitals in hardcopy billing?

entry.title: WebIDE time out
entry.content: We right-click on the Fiori project in the Full Stack Web IDE and select the Deploy option. Then, we proceed by choosing Deploy to SAPUI5 ABAP Repository. Next, we select the name of the connected system on BTP and continue. Finally, we choose the request on the system and start the deployment. However we got timeout error. We have increased the parameter HTML5.SocketReadTimeoutInSeconds. We have decreased the package size from 20MB to 4MB we didn"t get error. Is it related with the package size because it takes between 15-20 mins and it fails. Sometimes it is not failed and succesfully deployed.

entry.title: [Student Project] TypeError in Analytical List Page with OData V4
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm a student working on my end-of-study project and need your help with a Fiori issue. I'm developing an Analytical List Page using OData V4 service  with BTP Trial  and encountering a JavaScript error.

Context:
- App Type: Analytical List Page (ALP)
- Service: OData V4
- This is part of my final academic project

Problem:
I'm getting a TypeError: "Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'map')" when the FilterBar building block is being processed. The error occurs in the library-preload.js file.

Error Details:
trace info in the image :

 

{
"initialProperties": {
"showMessages": false,

"enableFallback": false,
"showAdaptFiltersButton": true,

"suspendSelection": true,

"initialLayout": "compact",

"_applyIdToContent": true,
"disableDraftEditStateFilter": false,
"internalFilterChanged": ".handlers.onFiltersChanged",
"internalSearch": ".handlers.onSearch",
"afterClear": ".onAfterClear"
},
"resolvedProperties": {
"contextPath": {
"path": "/zc_eee/",
"value": {
"$kind": "EntityType",
"$Key": [
"id"
],
"id": {
"$kind": "Property",
"$Type": "Edm.String",
"$Nullable": false,
"$MaxLength": 60
},
"equipment": {
"$kind": "Property",

"$Nullable": false,

},

},

},

},

},

},

},

"$Nullable": false,
"$MaxLength": 3
}
}
},
"isPublic": false
},
"missingContexts": {}
}

 

 

here is my cds from the abap : 

 

@AbapCatalog.sqlViewName: 'ZCEEE'
@AbapCatalog.compiler.compareFilter: true
@AbapCatalog.preserveKey: true
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'eeee'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define view zc_eee as select from ZC_EQUIPMENT_SELECTION as e 
{

  @ui.hidden: true                                  
  key e.id,

  @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 10 }]
  @ui.selectionField: [{ position: 10 }]           
  e.equipment,

  @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 20, label: 'Division localisation' }]
  @Consumption.valueHelpDefinition: [
    { entity: { name: 'ZC_EQUIPMENT_LOC', element: 'LocationDivision' } }
  ]
  e.division_loc,

  @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 30, label: 'Secteur' }]
  e.secteur_exp,

  @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 40, label: 'category ' }]
  e.categ_equip,

  e.type_objet,

  @ui.selectionField: [{ position: 20 }]          
  e.date_debut,

  @ui.selectionField: [{ position: 30 }]           
  e.date_fin,

  /* mesures agr√©g√©es */
  @DefaultAggregation: #SUM
  @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'unit_of_measure'
  @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 50 }]
  e.heures_marche,

  @DefaultAggregation: #SUM
  @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'unit_of_measure'
  @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 60 }]
  e.heures_pannes,

  @DefaultAggregation: #SUM
  @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'unit_of_measure'
  e.heures_entretien,

  @DefaultAggregation: #SUM
  @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'unit_of_measure'
  e.heures_repos,

  e.unite as unit_of_measure

}

 

 

this is the metadata.xml  generated by the  sap tools in vscode : 

 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="/sap/opu/odata/IWFND/CATALOGSERVICE;v=2/Vocabularies(TechnicalName='%2FIWBEP%2FVOC_UI',Version='0001',SAP__Origin='LOCAL')/$value">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1" Alias="SAP__UI"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="/sap/opu/odata/IWFND/CATALOGSERVICE;v=2/Vocabularies(TechnicalName='%2FIWBEP%2FVOC_HTML5',Version='0001',SAP__Origin='LOCAL')/$value">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.HTML5.v1" Alias="SAP__HTML5"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="/sap/opu/odata/IWFND/CATALOGSERVICE;v=2/Vocabularies(TechnicalName='%2FIWBEP%2FVOC_PDF',Version='0001',SAP__Origin='LOCAL')/$value">

    </edmx:Reference>

    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="/sap/opu/odata/IWFND/CATALOGSERVICE;v=2/Vocabularies(TechnicalName='%2FIWBEP%2FVOC_ODM',Version='0001',SAP__Origin='LOCAL')/$value">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.ODM.v1" Alias="SAP__ODM"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="/sap/opu/odata/IWFND/CATALOGSERVICE;v=2/Vocabularies(TechnicalName='%2FIWBEP%2FVOC_HIERARCHY',Version='0001',SAP__Origin='LOCAL')/$value">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.Hierarchy.v1" Alias="SAP__hierarchy"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:DataServices>
        <Schema Namespace="com.sap.gateway.srvd.zsrv_eee.v0001" Alias="SAP__self">
            <Annotation Term="SAP__core.SchemaVersion" String="1.0.0"/>
            <EntityType Name="zc_eeeType">
                <Key>
                    <PropertyRef Name="id"/>
                </Key>
                <Property Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="60"/>
                <Property Name="equipment" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="18"/>
                <Property Name="division_loc" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="18"/>
                <Property Name="secteur_exp" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="18"/>
                <Property Name="categ_equip" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="18"/>
                <Property Name="type_objet" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="18"/>
                <Property Name="date_debut" Type="Edm.Date"/>
                <Property Name="date_fin" Type="Edm.Date"/>
                <Property Name="heures_marche" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" Precision="15" Scale="3"/>
                <Property Name="heures_pannes" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" Precision="6" Scale="1"/>
                <Property Name="heures_entretien" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" Precision="6" Scale="1"/>
                <Property Name="heures_repos" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" Precision="15" Scale="3"/>
                <Property Name="unit_of_measure" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" MaxLength="3"/>
            </EntityType>
            <EntityContainer Name="Container">
                <EntitySet Name="zc_eee" EntityType="com.sap.gateway.srvd.zsrv_eee.v0001.zc_eeeType"/>
            </EntityContainer>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType/heures_marche">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__measures.Unit" Path="unit_of_measure"/>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType/heures_pannes">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__measures.Unit" Path="unit_of_measure"/>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType/heures_entretien">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__measures.Unit" Path="unit_of_measure"/>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType/heures_repos">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__measures.Unit" Path="unit_of_measure"/>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType/unit_of_measure">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__common.IsUnit"/>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType/division_loc">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__common.ValueListReferences">
                    <Collection>
                        <String>../../../../srvd_f4/sap/zc_equipment_loc/0001;ps='srvd-zsrv_eee-0001';va='com.sap.gateway.srvd.zsrv_eee.v0001.et-zc_eee.division_loc'/$metadata</String>
                    </Collection>
                </Annotation>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.zc_eeeType">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__common.Label" String="eeee"/>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__aggregation.ApplySupported">
                    <Record>
                        <PropertyValue Property="Transformations">
                            <Collection>
                                <String>aggregate</String>
                            </Collection>
                        </PropertyValue>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__UI.LineItem">
                    <Collection>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="equipment"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Label" String="Division localisation"/>
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="division_loc"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Label" String="Secteur"/>
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="secteur_exp"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Label" String="Category"/>
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="categ_equip"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="heures_marche"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="heures_pannes"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="heures_entretien"/>
                        </Record>
                        <Record Type="SAP__UI.DataField">
                            <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="heures_repos"/>
                        </Record>
                    </Collection>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__UI.SelectionFields">
                    <Collection>
                        <PropertyPath>equipment</PropertyPath>
                        <PropertyPath>date_debut</PropertyPath>
                        <PropertyPath>date_fin</PropertyPath>
                    </Collection>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__aggregation.CustomAggregate" Qualifier="heures_marche" String="Edm.Decimal"/>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__aggregation.CustomAggregate" Qualifier="heures_pannes" String="Edm.Decimal"/>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__aggregation.CustomAggregate" Qualifier="heures_entretien" String="Edm.Decimal"/>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__aggregation.CustomAggregate" Qualifier="heures_repos" String="Edm.Decimal"/>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.Container/zc_eee">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__capabilities.SearchRestrictions">
                    <Record>
                        <PropertyValue Property="Searchable" Bool="false"/>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>

                </Annotation>

                </Annotation>

                        <PropertyValue Property="QueryOptions">

                                <PropertyValue Property="SelectSupported" Bool="true"/>
                            </Record>

                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__capabilities.FilterRestrictions">
                    <Record>

                            <Collection>

                                    <PropertyValue Property="AllowedExpressions" String="MultiValue"/>
                                </Record>

                        </PropertyValue>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
            </Annotations>
            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.Container">
                <Annotation Term="SAP__CodeList.UnitsOfMeasure">
                    <Record>
                        <PropertyValue Property="Url" String="../../../../default/iwbep/common/0001/$metadata"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="CollectionPath" String="UnitsOfMeasure"/>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__common.ApplyMultiUnitBehaviorForSortingAndFiltering" Bool="true"/>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__capabilities.FilterFunctions">
                    <Collection>

                <Annotation Term="SAP__capabilities.SupportedFormats">

                    </Collection>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="SAP__PDF.Features">
                    <Record>
                        <PropertyValue Property="DocumentDescriptionReference" String="../../../../default/iwbep/common/0001/$metadata"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="DocumentDescriptionCollection" String="MyDocumentDescriptions"/>

                        <PropertyValue Property="ResultSizeMaximum" Int="20000"/>

            </Annotations>

                <Annotation Term="SAP__UI.Hidden"/>
            </Annotations>
        </Schema>
    </edmx:DataServices>
</edmx:Edmx>

 

the console  of page when i run fiori app :

What I've tried:
i tried to  take off the  filters from the CDS and regenerated new  app Fiori  but the  problem  persist ,  when  i try  to  make the preview form the Eclipse  , the  interface shows up  with no error !  

Question:
What could be causing this 'map' property to be undefined in the FilterBar context? Are there specific annotations or configurations I should check in my CDS view or service?

As a student, I would greatly appreciate any guidance or suggestions from the community!

entry.title: Passing custom parameters to MenuItem in SAP B1 Web Client add‚Äëon
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm developing an addon for the SAP B1 Web Client and I‚Äôm running into an issue with a‚ÄØMenuButton: I‚Äôd like to pass custom parameters (e.g. a timestamp, values from another data source, etc.) to my onMenuItemPress handler, but I can‚Äôt figure out the correct way to do this via aggregations and bindings.

Below are the relevant snippets from my original code:

// overlay.json
{
  "controller": "satacon.demo.demoSata.controller.test",
  "events": {
    "dataLoad": { "procName": "onDataLoad" }
  },
  "overlay": {
    "before": [
      {
        "guid": "eYw7UEkk3Qynbr4DjuHNax",
        "items": [
          {
            "guid": "pfKjesz1qTQaNiHm3NL7xM",
            "ctrlType": "b1.sdk.CheckBox",
            "label": "Checkbox Selected",
            "selected": "{@@data1>/selected}"
          },
          {
            "guid": "bWiRc3dAXqnVaXWSodqH7B",
            "ctrlType": "b1.sdk.Input",
            "label": "Input Value",
            "value": "{@@data1>/value}"
          },
          {
            "guid": "CPBttPSfQTeAQnOnOTXiFg",
            "ctrlType": "b1.sdk.MenuButton",
            "text": "MM1 Suite",
            "icon": "sap-icon://customize",
            "buttonMode": "Split",
            "items": {
              "path": "@@data3>/menuItemData",
              "rowsData": "{@@demo>/values}",           // Is this wrong?
              "template": {
                "ctrlType": "b1.sdk.MenuItem",
                "key": "{@@data3>key}",
                "text": "{@@data3>text}",
                "icon": "sap-icon://edit",
                "keyz": "{@@data1>/key}",              // Is this wrong?
                "press": {
                  "procName": "onMenuItemPress",
                  "params": {
                    "key":       "{@@data1>/key}",
                    "text":      "{@@data3>text}",
                    "timestamp": "{= new Date().toISOString() }",
                    "customParam":"myCustomValue"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
// Controller.js
define([ "./utility", "../model/models" ], function(utility, models) {
  class Controller {
    async onDataLoad(oEnv, oEvent) {
      // populate data1 and data3
      this.data1 = { selected: true, value: "hello", key: "CPBttPSfQTeAQnOnOTXiFg" };
      const oView = await oEnv.ActiveView();
      await oView.setCustomizedData(this.data1, "data1");

      const resp = await (await oEnv.getService()).ServiceLayer.get(
        "view.svc/flusso_nprsB1SLQuery?$filter=nprs_c_prg eq 'VE1200'&$select=nprs_c_srl,nprs_etichetta"
      );
      const rows = resp.getData().value.map(r => ({ key: r.nprs_c_srl, text: r.nprs_etichetta }));
      this.data3 = { menuItemData: rows };
      await oView.setCustomizedData(this.data3, "data3");
    }

    async onMenuItemPress(oEnv, oEvent) {
      const params = await oEvent.getParameter("params");
      // here I want to read params.key, params.text, params.timestamp, params.customParam
      await oEnv.showMessageBox("You selected:", JSON.stringify(params, null, 2));
    }
  }
  return Controller;
});

entry.title: Report to show Items in all Programs
entry.content: I need to inactivate a VID item. However, the item is in several programs. Does anyone know a way to find out which programs contain which items?

entry.title: Missing 'Public' checkbox in VariantManagement ‚Äì UI5 app with P13n
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I‚Äôm currently building a SAPUI5 standalone application (on-premise, not running in Fiori Launchpad) and I‚Äôm using the P13n engine with a GridTable. I‚Äôm using the UI5 version 1.120.33.  

I‚Äôm following this example from the SAPUI5 documentation:

Personalization for grid table - Samples - Demo Kit - SAPUI5 SDK

The variant management control is using the class sap.ui.fl.variants.VariantManagement

In that example, it's possible to save variants as public.
However, in my own app, the  "Public" checkbox and field are missing in the variant management popup ‚Äì I only see the option "Set as Default".

In the backend I have also given myself the role SAP_UI_FLEX_KEY_USER. Flexibility is also enabled in the manifest.json like this: "sap.ui5": { "flexEnabled": true, "libs": {"sap.ui.fl": {}}}

What could be the reason that the option to publish a variant as public is missing in my application?

Many thanks in advance

entry.title: Implementing "Add Card to Insights" in a Fiori Elements List Report Application
entry.content:
I am trying to implement the Add Card to Insights feature in my Fiori Elements List Report application but have encountered issues. Below is an overview of my application and the problem:

  • Type: Fiori Elements App (based on sap.fe.core.fpm)
  • OData Version: V4 with List Report
  • Customization:
    • Explicitly declared Variant Management in the XML view since it wasn't supported via the manifest.
    • Extended with a Custom XML View + Controller.

I want to enable the Add Card to Insights functionality for my List Report table. I attempted to configure this using the following controlConfiguration in my manifest.json:

"controlConfiguration": {
  "@com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.LineItem": {
    "tableSettings": {
      "type": "ResponsiveTable",
      "enableAddCardToInsights": true
    }
  }
}

 

However, this configuration did not work.

then

I manually called a POST request to the INSIGHTS_CARDS endpoint with dummy data for a card. The response indicated: "message": "Insights is inactive" with error code /UI2/INSIGHTS_MSG/008.

but
I'm getting XML response when i try to access this below metadata

/sap/opu/odata4/ui2/insights_srv/srvd/ui2/insights_cards_read_srv/0001/INSIGHTS_CARDS$metadata

entry.title: Flexible Programming Model show RAP Actions in footer? Is it possible?
entry.content:
Hey dear reader,

I have a FPM App with custom page with XML View and I would like to show the RAP Actions in a footer bar.
Something like a building block for actions.

I am able to show the buttons in the footer from a Fiori Elements Page or standard Object Page from the FPM with the same oData, but in my Custom Page I do not want to re-implement the whole parameter dialogs and call functions, rather then I would re-use this from the RAP framework.

Appreciate any help.

SAPUI5

entry.title: Enabaling/Disabling SAP Macros Table Action buttons with JS?
entry.content:
Hi all -wanted to know if its possible to control enabling/disabling a SAP Macros Table action on the front-end? I have a SAP UI5 application based on the Flexible Programming Model template. I have a task where when a user selects a table row, the action button should only enable when a specific table field is set to a certain value. 

Ex. When table field = 1 -> action1 button should be enabled. If table field is not 1, then action1 button is disabled. I know that the SAP macros XML attribute "enabled" can be set to false and true and I was hoping I can control that manually. 

I started the logic by grabbing the table controller "this.byId("table name") and can see the actions inside the object. I just was not sure if there were methods to retrieve the action objects? 

Update: I ended up solving this by creating a JSON model to bind to the "enable" property in the XML view of my macros action. I found a similar task here: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/enable-button-based-on-a-condition-sapui5/qaq-p/12606940

In my onInit() function I created a new JSON model -> set the action1 variable to false -> and then set the model "actionStatus"

onInit: function () {
PageController.prototype.onInit.apply(this, arguments); // needs to be called to properly initialize the page controller
const actionStatusModel = new sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel({
buttons: {
action1: false,
},
});
this.getView().setModel(actionStatusModel, "actionStatus");
},

In onAfterRendering function, I attach my function "buttonStatus" to the event handler "attachSelectionChange". This fires my buttonStatus function evertime I click on a table row in my list view. 

onAfterRendering: function () {
        const that = this;
        const oTable = that.byId("Table");
        if (oTable) {
          oTable.attachSelectionChange(this._buttonStatus.bind(this));
        }
      },

My buttonStatus function just grabs the table row data and checks for the value of the "status" field from the table. Depending on the value it will set the JSON model variable "action1" to true or leave it as false. We set the JSON model property. 

    _buttonStatus: async function (oEvent) {
        const oTable = this.byId("Table");
        const actionStatusModel = this.getView().getModel("actionStatus");

        const oSelectedData = await ActionHelper._getSelectedRowData(
          oTable
        );

        const statusField = oSelectedData.status;

        actionStatusModel.setProperty("/buttons", {
          action1: status === "0", //Enable if statusFIeld === 0, otherwise disable
        });
      },
 
Then in the XML view, we make sure that we bind the "enabled" property correctly. So now this will be set to either "true" or "false" depending on the outcome of buttonStatus function. 
<macros:Table class="table" id="Table" metaPath="@com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.LineItem" filterBar="FilterBar" selectionMode="Single" />
 <macros:actions>
   <macroTable:Action id="action1" key="action" text="Test" press=".onTest" placement="After" requiresSelection="true" enabled="{actionStatus>/buttons/action1}" />
 </macros:actions>
<macros:Table/><span><br /><br /><br /><div> <p><span>__PRESENT</span></p><p><span>__PRESENT</span></p><p><span>__PRESENT</span></p></div></span>

__PRESENT

entry.title: SAPUI5 Localization with i18n in annotations.xml not working
entry.content:
Hello,

I try to override annotations coming from backend OData service for SmartTable Headers with a local annotation.xml.

The local annotations file has been created using the Service Modeler.

I added some Annotations to the file, but it always states "Text key is not available. 'i18n.properties' file is missing or not registered in 'manifest.json' fileannotation-service(missing-i18n-key)". The problem is in line 39 of annotations.xml with the key "IsAssigned".

i18n is defined in manifest.json and the key I want to use is defined in i18n.properties.

I attached the manifest.json, the i18n.properties and the annotations.xml, maybe someone here has a solution for my problem.

Thank you!

entry.title: Error 404 with variants /sap/bc/lrep/actions/getcsrftoken/
entry.content:
Hello,

I've created an app with Fiori elements, and it was deployed in Cloud Foundry and Work Zone. When I tested the app in BAS it worked well, and I was able to save variants, but when I deployed it, variants didn't work. When I try to create a variant appears the next error.

I debug this error with the console, and I found the next:

I've checked the manifest.json file and it has the library sap.ui.fl. I've created a destination in BTP for the path /sap/bc/lrep/ and the problem persists. I don't know what else to do üò•

I hope your knowledge let me solve this problem.
